title: Kramer vs. Kramer
subject_group: Literature/American literature - Film and video adaptations
Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Trials in motion pictures
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Academy awards (Motion pictures)
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Single parents
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children of divorced parents
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Custody of children
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Fathers and sons
description: A sensitive drama about a small boy and his father who must fend for themselves when the wife and mother walks out on the family. Based on the novel by Avery Corman and starring Meryl Streep and Dustin Hoffman. Winner of five Academy Awards (including Best Picture).
